reviewText: I've been watching over & over practicing tecnique by tecnique, it does have very interesting fundamental applications also it is a good instructual video to start a base foundation to your at home hapkido training I recommend once you complete & can execute all tecniques into application as a muscle reflex, then you should start a at home hapkido black belt course! For me combat hapkido was it! Get this dvd to start & master it!

I bought this video to help keep my mind  fresh until I go back to class . There were some techniques that I recognized and some I did not . I thought the instructor was very detailed in his explanations of the techniques . The video angles are pretty good as well .
